Delete Your Account

Dear member,
if you think you will no longer use this website, you can ask us to permanently delete your account. Please note that you will not be able to re-enable it after deletion, or keep any added content, and we recommend that you back it up before proceeding.

See Details
?

After you propose to delete the account, it means that others cannot see your account on the website and all the information published through this account. After 14 days of the submission, we will start the deletion process. We will take up to 90 days (from the time the account is deleted and submitted) ) In order to delete your published content, which will no longer be visible to others when we delete it.

If you decide to back up your account, please fill in the fields to ensure that this operation is yours.

Verification

Successfully Submit

Dear member,
We will begin the removal process after 14 days, before which you can reactivate your account. It needs up to 90 days to delete all account content.
